name: Bug Killers
description: Bug Killers â€“ is a dynamic Top Down shooter where you will need to turn crowds of bugs-mutants into meat. The game has three modes: Survival, PvP and PvE. Different types of armament will help you to effectively destroy the enemies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4, AMD Athlon X2 2.8 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB Memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
